## General
### 05.06.2024: Inaugural Professorial Lecture ü§ì
My inaugural talk will take place on June 5th at the University of Konstanz which is open for everyone to join. The talk is followed by (finger) food and drinks ü•Ç
More information can be found [here](https://www.polver.uni-konstanz.de/fachbereich/aktuelles/veranstaltungen/aktuelle-termine/detail-aktuelle-termine/termin/inaugural-lecture-of-prof-dr-termeh-shafie/). 

### 20.02.2024: Multigraphr 0.2.0
The new version of [multigraphr](/project/rmm/#r-package-multigraphr) is published on CRAN. No user facing changes, just improved performance thanks to [David Schoch](https://mr.schochastics.net).

### 10.08.2023: Maternity Leave üê£
On parental leave until end of the year.

### 27.07.2023: Associate Professor of Computational Social Science and Data Science
Today I start my new position as a Professor (*Professorin mit Schwerpunkt Lehre*) at the Department of Politics and Public Administration, University of Konstanz.
